title: Akali  Needs Buffs.
body: Now that I can no longer trigger my Mark of the Assassin with Crescent Sweep I have split seconds less time to analyse fights as I have to right click my target, this consumes brain-power and as such has slowed down and reduced the effectiveness of my reprioritization of new or follow-up targets, leading to a drastic increase in the effectiveness of tanks during 5v5 brawls and I find this unfair as they already counter her, could we please see a reworking of Crescent Sweep to trigger Q and a nerf to damage possibly as I find it has impacted and reduced my effectiveness as an Assassin through delaying decisions, not through the rework. I would greatly appreciate if such a mechanic weren't also used on a Champion with such low attack speed - overall, it sucks in big fights and this is where Akali needs to be quick and have found her mid-late game fails because of it and rather than simply not being FOTM Assassin, she has been buried 9 feet deep and Zed continues to dominate, with very few counters other than huge poke teams and simply taking other similarly OP Champions to counter him.

replies.body: But when you auto attack and get that Q proc along with lich bane...
I agree there was no reason how have akali's e not proc q, it is now nearly impossible to proc is pre 6 without cc from another champ.
I know the thread is sarcasm, but I agree, she needs buffs.

She doesn't need buffs man it's a true story, I'd be happy with a nerf but this mechanic reverted because it ruined my oversight during team-fights and doesn't do much about her in-lane and whilst Riot argues otherwise it was intended as a nerf and to open up counterplay.
so revert the e nerf. ezpz.
